Class OFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.File
      • OFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.io.File>

    public class OFile
extends java.io.File
    OFile Opens file to read/write efficiently and intuitively.
    Since:
    August 2016
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.File
